testcase.classname: Enter valid email and navigate to opt page page
testcase.name: Login with valid email and navigate to opt page - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on flipKart home page.....................................passed When I double click on login button.........................................passed Then The user is on flipKart login page....................................passed And I enter valid email address "hassan@gmail.com"..........................passed When I click on RequestOTP button...........................................passed Then I should see the OTP message...........................................passed
